note.p: Physician. Attended Bowdoin College, Maine. Schoolteacher in Saco, York, Maine, circa 1880. Medical School of Maine, class of 1885; physician in Saco from 1888. Bank treasurer in Saco, 1910, 1920.
United States Federal Census 1880 (Saco, York, Maine 205/531B), 1900 (Saco, York, Maine 249/1), 1910 (Saco, York, Maine 257/4A), 1920 (Saco, York, Maine 124/6B) (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 July 2018)
